meanings.definition: To make or become characteristic of a Cockney
meanings.sent1: She cockneyfies her accent when she visits her relatives in London.
meanings.sent2: The actor cockneyfies his speech for the role in the play.
meanings.sent3: The parrot cockneyfies its squawk after spending time in the bustling city.
meanings.sent4: The old neighborhood cockneyfies itself with new shops and cafes.
meanings.sent5: The magic potion seemed to cockneyfy everything it touched.

meanings.definition: To cause to speak or behave like a Cockney
meanings.sent1: He cockneyfies his friends by teaching them rhyming slang.
meanings.sent2: The tour guide cockneyfies his speech to entertain the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The robot cockneyfies its responses, much to the amusement of the scientists.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter cockneyfies the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous imp cockneyfies the quiet library with his antics.
